Food has a major effect on the health of a person. Irregular ,uncontrolled eating leads to Obesity and many other diseases. Every 1 out of 5 children is suffering from obesity.Obesity leads to severe problems and even death.On an average human body needs 2000-2500 calories of food intake per day.The food intake should not be taken at once it is to be taken in regular intervals.Generally it is recommended to eat less in afternoon and night compared to morning.In biological terms there are many food components such as carbohydrates,proteins,fats,fibres,vitamins and minerals which are essential for the human body as everything has its own uses.All components are not available in a single food item.Some food items are rich in some components and others in others.Below is the data of calories and its main components present inside the food items. 
Walnuts 691 calories/100g Fat,Protein 
Almonds 575 calories/100g Fat,Protein 
Bananas 89 calories/100g Fiber 
Spinach 24 calories/100g Vitamins,Fiber 
Mushrooms 23 calories/100g Fiber,Protein 
Carrots 45 calories/100g Vitamins 
Onions 39 caloroes/100g Vitamins 
Corn 110 calories/100g Contains all except protein 
Tomatoes 25 calories/100g 
Chicken 230calories/100g Protein,Fats 
Fish 150calories/100g Protein 
Eggs 155calories/100g Protein 
Milk 50calories/100g Vitamins, Fats 
Rice 140calories/100g Carbohydrates 
Cheese 300 calories/100g Fats 
Lemons,oranges 100calories/100g Vitamins 
Uses of the above food items: 

 Chicken,fish,meat helps in building muscle Milk,leafy vegetables helps in making bones strong Carrots- Helps in preventing eye diseases Lemons,orange- Helps in preventing scurvy disease 
Good and healthy food leads to better functioning of body parts thus the person lives longer when compared to eating unhealthy food.
